page.title: 15TRANSPORT
page.content: Gilmerton is situated on the A85 which is a busy main route and is joined by a B-road in the village itself which runs down from Dunkeld. A traffic count was taken and in thirty minutes 166 cars passed. 53 of these took the Sma' Glen road, 59 passed from Crieff to Perth and 54 from Perth to Crieff. There were very few bikes or buses and a total of nine lorries. In a questionnaire it was found that 52% of people asked had a car and that a fairly frequent bus service catered for the rest, though the service was not good on a Sunday. Since this is a busy main road crossing it can be dangerous. Many drivers do not adhere to the speed limits through Gilmerton and many residents felt a crossing was badly needed.
